channel.title: Help how do you make people mods on a megascape source #2
channel.description:
ok i made a post about this ages ago but my m8 sed that when he changes the rights of someone it doesnt save
on my last topic about this someone said that he has to edit the compile or something
________________________________________________________________________________________
But he doesn't know what to edit....plz SOME ONE HELP
if ur realy kind and helpful, could you post a pic of it plz.....if not its kl..
